Description:
We are currently seeking a skilled and experienced General Accountant to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a General Accountant, you will be responsible for maintaining financial records and ensuring compliance with accounting regulations. The ideal candidate will have strong attention to detail, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work independently.Responsibilities:Prepare financial statements and reports, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements
Manage accounts payable and receivable functions, including processing invoices, making payments, and reconciling accounts
Ensure accurate and timely recording of financial transactions in the general ledger
Perform periodic financial analyses and provide insights to management on financial performance
Assist with budgeting and forecasting processes
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with accounting standards and procedures
Prepare and submit tax returns and other regulatory reports
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to resolve accounting-related issues
Stay updated on changes in accounting regulations and ensure compliance
Assist with ad-hoc financial projects as needed.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
Proven experience as a General Accountant or similar role
Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices
Proficient in using accounting software and MS Office, particularly Excel
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Knowledge of Saudi Arabian accounting regulations is a plus
Professional certification such as ACCA or CMA is preferred
